name: language-resource-manager-plugin
description: Figma plugin for language resource management and accessibility analysis

scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-ui
scripts.build-ui: tsc src/ui.ts --outDir dist --target es2017 --moduleResolution node --lib dom,dom.iterable --skipLibCheck && cp src/ui.html dist/
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-main & npm run watch-ui
scripts.watch-ui: tsc src/ui.ts --outDir dist --target es2017 --moduleResolution node --lib dom,dom.iterable --skipLibCheck --watch
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
